v-model:offset.description: Control the position of the bubbles

axis.description: The direction of dragging, 'xy' for free dragging, 'lock' for prohibiting dragging
axis.description_zh: 拖拽的方向，`xy` 代表自由拖拽，`lock` 代表禁止拖拽

icon.description: The name of the bubble icon or the link to the image is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
icon.description_zh: 气泡图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

:gap.description: The minimum spacing between the bubble and the window, in px
:gap.description_zh: 气泡与窗口的最小间距，单位为 px

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked

events.name: offset-change
events.description: Triggered when the position is changed due to the user's dragging
events.description_zh: 由用户拖拽导致位置改变后触发
